item.title: OpenHW Group Privacy Policy
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: May 29, 2019 The OpenHW Group, Inc. (“OpenHW Group”, “Us” or “We”) is a member-supported not-for-profit organization which acts as the steward of our open source projects, community, and ecosystem. We are committed to our community members’ rights to privacy. We promise to share transparently all aspects of how OpenHW Group projects and websites work in regards to privacy, terms, and personal data, and We are in full support of efforts to ensure your protection online.

item.title: OpenHW Group Terms of Use
item.author: chris.guindon@eclipse-foundation.org (Christopher Guindon)
item.description: May 28, 2019 Terms and Conditions of Use for the OpenHW Group Web Site and Related Services As used herein, the term “you” means the individual accessing this Web site, as well as any person or entity which has granted to such individual the authority to enter into this agreement on its behalf. By accessing, browsing, or using this Web site, you acknowledge that you have read, understand, and agree to be bound by these terms.
